markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 9"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Mana-Rattler Liniment](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1611)
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Outlaws of Alkenstar</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Alchemical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=6" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Elixir" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=59" />
<trait label="Morph" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=113" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #180: The Smoking Gun](/Sources.aspx?ID=125) pg. 77</row>

**Price** 110 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>Interact</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

According to reports, as well as Emelett's own marketing pitches, this lotion is derived from rare mana rattlesnakes whose oils ward against poison and disease. When applied, you can attempt to [counteract](/Rules.aspx?ID=371) a [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126) or [disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=46) effect currently afflicting you. The potion has a counteract level of 5 and a +15 modifier for the roll. You also acquire a serpentine appearance, growing fangs and scaly skin. For 1 hour, you gain a fangs [unarmed](/Traits.aspx?ID=199) attack that deals 1d6 piercing damage plus 1 poison damage.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Mana-Rattler Liniment
